sn35.135:4.1: * “Lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāya.
sn35.135:4.2: Diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, chaphassāyatanikā nāma nirayā.
sn35.135:4.3: Tattha yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati aniṭṭharūpaṃyeva passati, no iṭṭharūpaṃ;
sn35.135:4.6: Yaṃ kiñci sotena saddaṃ suṇāti … pe …
sn35.135:4.7: yaṃ kiñci ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyati … pe …
sn35.135:4.8: yaṃ kiñci jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati … pe …
sn35.135:4.9: yaṃ kiñci kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusati … pe …
sn35.135:4.10: yaṃ kiñci manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti aniṭṭharūpaṃyeva vijānāti, no iṭṭharūpaṃ;
sn35.135:4.13: Lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāya.
sn35.135:4.14: Diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, chaphassāyatanikā nāma saggā.
sn35.135:4.15: Tattha yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati iṭṭharūpaṃyeva passati, no aniṭṭharūpaṃ;
sn35.135:4.18: yaṃ kiñci jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati … pe …
sn35.135:4.19: yaṃ kiñci manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti iṭṭharūpaṃyeva vijānāti, no aniṭṭharūpaṃ;
sn35.135:4.22: Lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti.
